column4: How is it possible that my Travelmate 240 laptop doesn't detect the ethernet connection when I plug in the cable, and requires me to reactivate it? Is there a way to run a script that would reactivate the eth0 connection when the cable is plugged in?
there was talk of a daemon that would detect the network being plugged in and configure it, but I'm not sure if it really exists yet...
unfortunately yes, ubuntu doesn't yet handle networks being unplugged and restored as well as it could... :(
